forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 44. North northeast wind 0 to 5 mph.

forecast.name: M.L. King Jr. Day
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. Northeast wind 6 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph.

weather_report:
In the stillness of the early morning, Downtown San Francisco awakens beneath a gentle blanket of partly cloudy skies, reminiscent of a serene dreamscape where the air is crisp and invigorating. The temperature rests comfortably around the mid-forties, allowing for a refreshing start to the day. As the sun rises, it unveils the promise of a cheerful afternoon, edging toward sixty degrees under the watchful gaze of a vibrant, azure sky. Breezes from the northeast dance through the streets, occasionally gusting, hinting at the restless spirit of the city.

Today, the scene is one of clarity, devoid of the fog that often cloaks this bay area. Instead, a lightness envelops the city, encouraging leisurely strolls along the waterfront or perhaps a meandering walk through one of its lush parks. Attire should lean towards layers—a light jacket over an inviting sweater will be your best ally as the day warms and the sun shines brightly. As the sun begins its descent into the evening, consider sipping a warm beverage at an outdoor café, where you can bask in the fading light and the gentle hum of urban life, a simple yet profound meditation on the beauty of the day.
